settings.title: Pure & Lab tested saffron
settings.content:
There are four trims to consider when purchasing Saffron. These are Sargol, Negin, Super Negin and Pushali. What differentiates these grades from one another is how much of the yellow and white part of the stigma is removed.

Each Saffron flower (Crocus Sativus L.) contains only three stigmas. Each of these threads are handpicked and trimmed. The yellow and white portion of the stigma contain no medicinal or culinary benefit so ideally you want all-red threads. Sargol and Super Negin are the only two grades that are all-red. Super Negin is the most expensive because it contains long, uniform threads whereas Sargol contains only the tip of the stigma which often times is mixed with broken threads.

Once you determine what trim of saffron you want, its important to analyze the potency of Saffron. Not all Saffron is equal. The three main components that determine the potency of saffron are Crocin (Color), Safranal (Aroma), and Picocrocin (Flavor). There are other factors such as moisture content, the absence of fillers and adulteration that are equally important.

settings.title: ZARAN | SPANISH "COUPE" GRADE
settings.content: Coupe Saffron threads are the best saffron you can get from the La Mancha region of Spain. This region produces some of the best Saffron found anywhere in the world. Similar to the Super Negin threads, Coupe is all-red with very high aroma and flavor. Spanish Coupe Saffron isÂ commonly used in dishes such as Spanish paella, Italian risotto, and French bouillabaisse.

settings.title: Saffron + Rose Basmati
settings.content:
At Zaran Saffron, we're constantly pushing the envelope of creativity. We're not just obsessed with selling the Highest Quality Saffron we can get our hands on. We want to curate a lifestyle around Saffron and share it with our customers and foodies alike.

Saffron adds a heavenly aroma and flavor to your dishes. Zaran Saffron is the perfect addition to your spice cabinet. Whether you're looking to elevate your recipes or drinks, we've got you covered!
